trans-unit.source: Specifies a property that is offered by an extender provider.
trans-unit.target: 指定擴充性提供者提供的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ExtenderProvidedPropertyAttribute> is injected automatically by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class on properties that are exposed as extended properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ExtenderProvidedPropertyAttribute>自動注入<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>類別會公開為擴充屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this attribute on your properties.
trans-unit.target: 請勿在您的屬性上使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProvidePropertyAttribute> on a type that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<xref:System.ComponentModel.ProvidePropertyAttribute>實作的型別上<xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider>介面。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extender Providers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ce043d8-cd48-49dd-abef-185a2079e96a).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[擴充性提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ce043d8-cd48-49dd-abef-185a2079e96a)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ExtenderProvidedPropertyAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ExtenderProvidedPropertyAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with this instance or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 要與這個執行個體進行比較的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，或 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值指出此執行個體是否與指定的物件相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 和這個執行個體具有相同的類型和值，則為 <paramref name="obj" />否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property that is being provided.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> encapsulating the property that is being provided.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />，封裝提供的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Provides an indication whether the value of this instance is the default value for the derived class.
trans-unit.target: 提供這個執行個體的值是否為衍生類別預設值的指示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this instance is the default attribute for the class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個執行個體為預設屬性的類別，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the extender provider that is providing the property.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供屬性的擴充性提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider" /> that is providing the property.
trans-unit.target: 提供屬性的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of object that can receive the property.
trans-unit.target: 取得可以接收屬性之物件的型別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> describing the type of object that can receive the property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，描述可以接收屬性之物件的型別。
